title: Cardfight!! Vanguard G: Stride Generation
original_name: カードファイト!! ヴァンガード G ストライドジェネレーション
sinopse:
One day, Chrono Shindou finds a Vanguard deck in his locker at school. With a never before seen clan called "Gear Chronicle," the gears of his fate begin to move.

(Source: Bushiroad, translated)
